title: Getting Started with Modern JavaScript
excerpt: Learn the fundamentals of ES6+ features including arrow functions, destructuring, and async/await.
content:
JavaScript has evolved significantly. ES6 introduced features that make coding easier and more fun.

Arrow Functions

Concise syntax for functions.

title: Building Scalable React Applications
excerpt: Best practices for structuring large React apps with proper state management and component architecture.
content: Structuring large React apps requires careful planning. Use Context API or Redux for state management.

title: Introduction to TypeScript
excerpt: Why TypeScript is becoming essential for modern web development and how to get started.
content: TypeScript adds static typing to JavaScript, helping catch errors early.

title: The Rise of Agentic AI
excerpt: How autonomous agents are transforming software development and automation.
content: Agentic AI can perform actions, not just answer questions. It's the future of automation.

title: Understanding Large Language Models
excerpt: A deep dive into how LLMs work and their applications in modern tech.
content: LLMs like GPT-4 are trained on massive datasets to understand and generate human-like text.

title: Google NotebookLM: The Future of AI Note-Taking
excerpt: Discover how Google's NotebookLM uses Gemini Pro to transform your documents into an intelligent research assistant.
content:
What is NotebookLM?

Google NotebookLM is an AI-powered note-taking tool designed to help you understand and synthesize information from your own documents.

Key Features

  • Grounded Answers: AI answers based only on your documents.
  • Audio Overview: Turn your notes into a podcast-like discussion.

title: Google Nano Banana: A Sweet AI Surprise
excerpt: Exploring the fun and potential of Google's latest experimental AI project, 'Nano Banana'. What does it mean for mobile AI?
content:
What is Nano Banana?

A fun codename for Google's latest mobile AI experiments using Gemini Nano.

Sweet Tech

Powerful AI right in your pocket, offline and fast.

title: Google Anti Gravity: Defying Physics with Code
excerpt: A look back at the classic Google Anti Gravity easter egg and how modern web physics engines have evolved.
content:
Falling Down

The classic easter egg where Google search results fall due to gravity.

The Tech

Powered by physics engines like Box2D.
